query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Billie Jean', revolutionize the music industry and influence future artists?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal techniques and emotional delivery contribute to her success as one of the best-selling female artists of all time?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to reinvent his musical style and persona impact the evolution of popular music and culture during his career?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's theatrical performances and songwriting contribute to the enduring legacy of Queen as one of the greatest rock bands in history?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's blend of pop and R&B, along with her vocal range, shaped her identity as a contemporary music icon?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's music and message of peace and social justice influence the global perception of reggae and its cultural significance?
